field.name: placeholder_blocked_resources_text
field.default: You must accept cookies and reload the page to view this content
field.label: COM_GDPR_PLACEHOLDER_BLOCKED_RESOURCES_TEXT

field.name: message
field.default: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
field.label: COM_GDPR_MESSAGE_TEXT

field.name: deny_message
field.default: You have declined cookies, to ensure the best experience on this website please consent the cookie usage.
field.label: COM_GDPR_DENY_MESSAGE_TEXT

field.name: cookie_category1_description
field.default: Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.
field.label: COM_GDPR_COOKIE_CATEGORY1_DESCRIPTION

field.name: cookie_category2_description
field.default: Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.
field.label: COM_GDPR_COOKIE_CATEGORY2_DESCRIPTION

field.name: cookie_category3_description
field.default: Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
field.label: COM_GDPR_COOKIE_CATEGORY3_DESCRIPTION

field.name: cookie_category4_description
field.default: Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.
field.label: COM_GDPR_COOKIE_CATEGORY4_DESCRIPTION

field.name: privacy_policy_checkbox_link_title
field.default: Please agree to our privacy policy, otherwise you will not be able to register.
field.label: COM_GDPR_PRIVACY_POLICY_CHECKBOX_LINK_TITLE
